itunes:title: Episode 676 - DB Sports Companion Show 9/16/20 - The Big Ten Is Back!
title: Episode 676 - DB Sports Companion Show 9/16/20 - The Big Ten Is Back!
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by special guest former Navy SEAL Ray "Cash" Care and Duke Cannon CEO Sam Swartz as they discuss the return of Big Ten football and why Ross thinks Ohio State will win the Natty, what it was like drinking with P...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by special guest former Navy SEAL Ray "Cash" Care and Duke Cannon CEO Sam Swartz as they discuss the return of Big Ten football and why Ross thinks Ohio State will win the Natty, what it was like drinking with PGA legend John Daly, the Clippers losing in Game 7 to the Nuggets, and we break down all the spreads from this week's College Football and NFL Week 2 games.

ghostbed.com/drinkinbros
